Register to Learn More About Pivotal HD Register For Our Webinar and Get Up to Speed on Pivotal HD Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Join us <http://play.gopivotal.com/GlobalPivotalHDLaunch2.html> for our first installment of our "What You Can Do With Hadoop" Webinar series. Every month we will discuss technical and business topics, use cases, thought leadership from industry experts, customer examples and more. Our first webinar – Exploring Pivotal HD Single Node (VM) – kicks off Friday, August 2, 2013 at 10AM (GMT+8) <http://play.gopivotal.com/GlobalPivotalHDLaunch2.html>. During this one-hour exploratory webinar you will:
- Get an introduction to Pivotal - Learn what's inside Pivotal HD Single Node (VM) - Understand how to use Pivotal HD Single Node (VM) effectively - See use cases and tutorials - Get your questions answered
Register today <http://play.gopivotal.com/GlobalPivotalHDLaunch2.html>
